name: Button Head
description:
The time is running out! Switch on all the doors before the clock kills you!

Move through different stages solving platform puzzles before the count down finishes!

Play on WEB here (but better graphic experience in Windows):
http://www.timemachineapps.com/jams/button-head/

Gamepad:

A or B
Jump
X or Y
Switch
Left Stick
Move
DpadMove

Keyboard:

Space JumpControl SwitchWASDMove ArrowsMove Tools:
  • Unity
  • Pyxel Edit
  • Groovepad
  • Ocenaudio
  • Reaper
